name: Pixelpad
body:
PixelPad
========

Light painting tool for Android, inspired by PixelStick.


What is it for
===============

This application displays any image to be used in light painting (a type of photography). Using the application, a user can create a hologram-like effect for the picture.

How it works
============

The display is done by showing only one column of pixel for a very short time, then displaying the next one till the end of the picture. 
Putting a camera on a long exposure and dragging the device left in front of the camera would paint the selected picture.


Inspiration
===========

This project is inspired by PixelStick: http://thepixelstick.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
